name: Soft Touch Linen Women's Robe Terry Cotton Cloth- Kimono Style- Thick, Breathable & Comfortable- Lightweight & Absorbent
product_description: Luxurious Terry Kimono Women’s Bathrobe Made in premium Terry Cotton Turky | Ultra-Absorbent | All Sizes & Colors Available. name: Turkish Linen Waffle Knit Lightweight Kimono Spa & Bath Robes for Women - Quick Dry - Soft
product_description: TURKISH LINEN COTTON BLEND LIGHTWEIGHT LONG BATH & SPA ROBES Our lightweight long kimono robes are made of 52% cotton and 48% polyester which makes them lightweight. These waffle weave robes are smooth, breathable, highly absorbent and double-stitched for durability. These robes are perfect for spa, bath, nightwear, pool or even to lounge in after a long day. Features: A high-quality belt to adjust for a perfect fit. Lightweight and quick dry. A large selection of 8 trendy colors. Two large pockets for your essentials. Machine wash cold water, tumble dry low-medium and no bleach. Perfect gift for loved ones. Size & Fit Information: Experience ultimate comfort with our Turkish Linen Waffle Knit Kimono Robe, designed in a universal fit to accommodate a range of body types. This lightweight, quick-dry spa robe features a classic kimono style with thoughtful details and generous sizing. ✔️ Size S fits most petite builds with a length of 41.5", sleeve of 18.5", and sweep of 49.5". ✔️ Size M offers a balanced fit with a 44.5" length and 19.5" sleeve, ideal for average builds. ✔️ Size L/One Size fits well on heights up to 6'1", with a 51" length, 20" sleeve, and 56" sweep. ✔️ Size XXL offers extended comfort, with a 52" length, 21" sleeve, and 71" sweep for broader or taller figures.
